Package org.apache.hama.commons.math

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    DoubleDoubleVectorFunction Deprecated
    DoubleMatrix
    Standard matrix interface for double elements.
    DoubleVector
    Vector with doubles.
    DoubleVectorFunction Deprecated
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    CrossEntropy
    The cross entropy cost function.
    DenseDoubleMatrix
    Dense double matrix implementation, internally uses two dimensional double arrays.
    DenseDoubleVector
    Dense double vector implementation.
    DoubleDoubleFunction
    A double double function takes two arguments.
    DoubleFunction
    A double double function takes two arguments.
    DoubleVector.DoubleVectorElement
    Class for iteration of elements, consists of an index and a value at this index.
    Function
    A generic function.
    FunctionFactory
    Factory to create the functions.
    IdentityFunction
    The identity function f(x) = x.
    NamedDoubleVector  
    Sigmoid
    The Sigmoid function
    SparseDoubleVector
    The implementation of SparseVector.
    SquaredError
    Square error cost function.
    SquareVectorFunction  
    Tanh
    Tanh function.
    Tuple<FIRST,SECOND>
    Tuple class to hold two generic attributes.
